metadata.name: DNS Exfiltration and Tunneling Tools Execution

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\iodine.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\dnscat2')))

metadata.objective: False positive: Unlikely References: https://github.com/iagox86/dnscat2, https://github.com/yarrick/iodine
